resources.string: 27 years old and a passionate engineer with an eye for both the big picture and the details.
After my training as a mechatronics technician, I completed both my Bachelor's and Master's in Electrical and Information Technology at htw saar.

Whether it is programming embedded systems, automating manufacturing and testing processes, or developing bespoke software: I love analyzing complex technical challenges and implementing pragmatic solutions with a creative approach.

In my free time, I find balance in badminton, making music, and singing in a choir. Playing the piano and organ, as well as singing with the Junge Chor Wallerfangen, recharges my energy for my technical projects.
Cooperative Master's studies in Electrical and Information Technology with a specialization in electromobility and autonomous driving.
Development of an object-oriented component structure for processing and visualizing 3D sensor data
Cooperative Bachelor's studies in Electrical and Information Technology with a specialization in automation technology.
Design and implementation of an automated release management system for the automation software x-line
Temporary employment as an installer until the start of my studies.
On-the-job training as a mechatronics technician.
University of Applied Sciences for Technology and Economy of Saarland
Master of Science in Electrical and Information Technology
Hardware Implementation of digital Algorithms in DSP and FPGA
Bachelor of Engineering in Electrical and Information Technology
Smart Grids and Decentralized Energy Generation
High School Diploma (General University Entrance Qualification)
During my Master Thesis, I developed an object-oriented component structure for processing and visualizing 3D sensor data for the in-house automation software x-line at DÃ¼rr Assembly Products GmbH.
Plugin for Admidio to manage the inventory stocks of an Admidio organization.
During my Bachelor Thesis, I developed a comprehensive release management system for the in-house automation software x-line at DÃ¼rr Assembly Products GmbH that fully automates manual steps.
Web app of the Junge Chor Wallerfangen e.V. for the digital management and distribution of choir sheet music, and the creation of attendance lists.

As part of the master's elective module Software Development with C/C++, I developed a two-axis solar tracker in a project. The system automatically positions a solar panel optimally to the sunlight. An Arduino Uno is used to control the movement sequences and process the sensor data.

In addition to concept development and software design, a hardware setup was first built in the online simulation environment Wokwi and later with 3D-printed parts, which were used for the software tests.
Music Synthesis Using DSP and FPGA

In the context of the master's elective module Hardware Implementation of Digital Algorithms in DSP and FPGA, the pressing need for high-performance hardware platforms like DSP and FPGA was highlighted. This project demonstrates the practical implementation of digital algorithms, exemplified by the realization of IIR filters and music synthesis.
Using the implemented signal processing algorithms to transform a harmonic sine signal into a digital instrument, the project culminated with a digital version of the piece FÃ¼r Elise.

During my bachelor's studies, a frequency converter test bench was redesigned as part of the module Process Automation. In addition to revising the control systemâ€”which was implemented using Tia Portalâ€”the entire hardware setup was overhauled.

The corresponding technical drawings were created with Inventor, and the necessary circuit diagrams were developed using EPLAN. Finally, the hardware setup was assembled and the test bench was commissioned.
The Junge Chor Wallerfangen e.V. is a mixed choir with about 45 active singers, specializing in both secular and sacred music.

In 2016, I first joined the choir as a singer (tenor) and in 2019, I took on the role of sheet music treasurer. In this position, I am primarily responsible for the management and distribution of choir sheet music.

During my time on the board and the restructuring of the choir's online presence, I assumed server administration responsibilities. In this role, I am responsible for the maintenance and operation of the online member management (Intranet), the Nextcloud instance, and the custom-developed sheet music management web app.
